name: 05-Optimized-Laddering
parameters: --var execute=true --var selectSize='L' --var workflow_12_selectmodels=GBR,RF,DT --var workflow_12_independentvariables=LOG_PRD_PRICE,EVENT,SVD --var workflow_12_transformvariables=PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR1,PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR2,PACK_PRICE_COMPETITOR3 --var workflow_12_adstockvariables=ADV_SPEND --var workflow_12_dependentvariables=LOG_SALES_VOLUME --var workflow_12_lossfunction=MAPE --var combinedVisual=true --var ValidationWeek=2 --var destinationPath=data/CPG/Retail-Price-Optimization/Upload-Test-File --var selectSku=PRD_CODE_26 --var getPrediction=false --var modelPath=data/CPG/Retail-Price-Optimization/Model-Path/

fields.name: code
fields.value:
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql import *
from fire.workflowcontext import WorkflowContext
from pulp import *
import pandas as pd

def _debug_print(msg, trace=True):
    if trace: print(msg)
    else:
        pass

def optimize_revenue(df_price_x_revenue = pd.DataFrame(), order_skus = [], laddering = True, trace=False ):
    df = df_price_x_revenue
    SKUS = order_skus

    PRICES = {}
    REVENUE = {}
    Pred_Volume = {}

    for sku in SKUS:
        PRICES[sku] = list(df[df["PRD_CD"] == sku]["PRICE"])
        REVENUE[sku] = list(df[df["PRD_CD"] == sku]["REVENUE"])
        Pred_Volume[sku] = list(df[df["PRD_CD"] == sku]["PRED_VOLUME"])

    _NO_ITEM = 1000

    # Create the problem instance
    problem = LpProblem("Ladder", LpMaximize)

    # Decision variables
    items = range(_NO_ITEM)  # Number of items

    selected = {}
    for sku in SKUS:
        selected[sku] = LpVariable.dicts(sku, items, cat="Binary")

    # Objective function: Maximize the total value
    problem += lpSum(selected[sku][i] * REVENUE[sku][i] for sku in SKUS for i in range(_NO_ITEM))

    # Constraint: Laddering constraints, where pack count should less pack price
    if laddering:
        for ix in range(len(SKUS)-1):
            lsku = SKUS[ix]
            rsku = SKUS[ix+1]
            problem += lpSum(selected[lsku][i] * PRICES[lsku][i] for i in items) - \
                  lpSum(selected[rsku][i] * PRICES[rsku][i] for i in items) <= 0, "{}_{}".format(lsku, rsku)

    # Constraint: Per SKU, only one (price,revenue) will be selected
    for sku in SKUS:
        problem += lpSum(selected[sku][i] for i in items) ==  1, sku


    # Solve the problem
    LpSolverDefault.msg = False
    LpSolverDefault.solve(problem)
    #problem.solve()

    # Print the optimal solution
    sku_selection = {}
    _debug_print("Optimal Solution:", trace)
    for sku in SKUS:
        for i in items:
            if selected[sku][i].value() == 1:
                _debug_print(f"SKU = {sku}, Item {i + 1} is selected", trace)
                _debug_print(f"Price = {PRICES[sku][i]}", trace)
                _debug_print(f"Revenue = {REVENUE[sku][i]}", trace )
                _debug_print(f"Pred_Vol = {Pred_Volume[sku][i]}", trace )
                _debug_print("", trace)
                sku_selection[sku] = {"id": i,
                                      "Price": PRICES[sku][i],
                                      "Revenue": REVENUE[sku][i],
                                      "Pred_Vol": Pred_Volume[sku][i]
                                      }

    # Print the maximum value
    _debug_print(f"Maximum Value: {value(problem.objective)}", trace)

    return value(problem.objective), sku_selection

def myfn(spark: SparkSession, workflowContext: WorkflowContext, id: int, inDF: DataFrame, cust_dict:dict):

    ORDERED_SKUS = ["PRD_CODE_23", "PRD_CODE_21", "PRD_CODE_6", "PRD_CODE_27", "PRD_CODE_15", "PRD_CODE_26"]
    df = inDF.select("*").toPandas()

    #when Laddering is false
    led = optimize_revenue(df, ORDERED_SKUS, laddering=False)
    d111 = pd.DataFrame(led[1:][0]).T
    d1 = d111[['Price', 'Revenue','Pred_Vol']]
    d11 = d1.reset_index()
    d11.columns = ['PRD_CD', 'Price', 'Revenue','Pred_Vol']
    replacement_dict = {
    "PRD_CODE_21": "PRD_CODE_21-128",
    "PRD_CODE_27": "PRD_CODE_27-64",
    "PRD_CODE_23": "PRD_CODE_23-192",
    "PRD_CODE_6": "PRD_CODE_6-84",
    "PRD_CODE_15": "PRD_CODE_15-42",
    "PRD_CODE_26": "PRD_CODE_26-28"  }
    d11["PRD_CD"] = d11["PRD_CD"].replace(replacement_dict)
    d11["PACK_COUNT"] = d11["PRD_CD"].apply(lambda x: x.split('-')[1])
    d11["PACK_COUNT"] = pd.to_numeric(d11["PACK_COUNT"])    
    schema = StructType([StructField("PRD_CD", StringType(), True)
                            , StructField("Price", DoubleType(), True)
                            , StructField("Revenue", DoubleType(), True)
                            , StructField("Pred_Vol", DoubleType(), True)
                            , StructField("PACK_COUNT", IntegerType(), True)
                            ])
    outDF = spark.createDataFrame(d11, schema=schema)

    return outDF

fields.description: PySpark code to be run. Input dataframe : "inDF", SparkContext : "sc", SQLContext : "sqlContext",  Output/Result dataframe should be registered as a temporary table - df.registerTempTable("outDF")

fields.name: tempTable

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT SPLIT(b.	PRD_CD, '-')[0] as PRD_CD, b.PACK_COUNT ,
b.Price as MAX_PRD_PRICE, b.Pred_Vol as MAX_PRED_VOLUME, 
    b.REVENUE MAX_REVENUE,
  CASE b.PRD_CD 
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_26-28' THEN 499 
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_27-64' THEN 1399 
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_21-128' THEN 2799  
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_6-84' THEN 1698  
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_15-42' THEN 849  
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_23-192' THEN 3899  
        ELSE 0  -- Default value when ASIN does not match any case
    END * b.Pred_Vol AS MRP_REVENUE 
FROM fire_temp_table b

fields.value:
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql import *
from fire.workflowcontext import WorkflowContext
from pulp import *
import pandas as pd

def _debug_print(msg, trace=True):
    if trace: print(msg)
    else:
        pass

def optimize_revenue(df_price_x_revenue = pd.DataFrame(), order_skus = [], laddering = True, trace=False ):
    df = df_price_x_revenue
    SKUS = order_skus

    PRICES = {}
    REVENUE = {}
    Pred_Volume = {}

    for sku in SKUS:
        PRICES[sku] = list(df[df["PRD_CD"] == sku]["PRICE"])
        REVENUE[sku] = list(df[df["PRD_CD"] == sku]["REVENUE"])
        Pred_Volume[sku] = list(df[df["PRD_CD"] == sku]["PRED_VOLUME"])

    _NO_ITEM = 1000

    # Create the problem instance
    problem = LpProblem("Ladder", LpMaximize)

    # Decision variables
    items = range(_NO_ITEM)  # Number of items

    selected = {}
    for sku in SKUS:
        selected[sku] = LpVariable.dicts(sku, items, cat="Binary")

    # Objective function: Maximize the total value
    problem += lpSum(selected[sku][i] * REVENUE[sku][i] for sku in SKUS for i in range(_NO_ITEM))

    # Constraint: Laddering constraints, where pack count should less pack price
    if laddering:
        for ix in range(len(SKUS)-1):
            lsku = SKUS[ix]
            rsku = SKUS[ix+1]
            problem += lpSum(selected[lsku][i] * PRICES[lsku][i] for i in items) - \
                  lpSum(selected[rsku][i] * PRICES[rsku][i] for i in items) <= 0, "{}_{}".format(lsku, rsku)

    # Constraint: Per SKU, only one (price,revenue) will be selected
    for sku in SKUS:
        problem += lpSum(selected[sku][i] for i in items) ==  1, sku


    # Solve the problem
    LpSolverDefault.msg = False
    LpSolverDefault.solve(problem)
    #problem.solve()

    # Print the optimal solution
    sku_selection = {}
    _debug_print("Optimal Solution:", trace)
    for sku in SKUS:
        for i in items:
            if selected[sku][i].value() == 1:
                _debug_print(f"SKU = {sku}, Item {i + 1} is selected", trace)
                _debug_print(f"Price = {PRICES[sku][i]}", trace)
                _debug_print(f"Revenue = {REVENUE[sku][i]}", trace )
                _debug_print(f"Pred_Vol = {Pred_Volume[sku][i]}", trace )
                _debug_print("", trace)
                sku_selection[sku] = {"id": i,
                                      "Price": PRICES[sku][i],
                                      "Revenue": REVENUE[sku][i],
                                      "Pred_Vol": Pred_Volume[sku][i]
                                      }

    # Print the maximum value
    _debug_print(f"Maximum Value: {value(problem.objective)}", trace)

    return value(problem.objective), sku_selection

def myfn(spark: SparkSession, workflowContext: WorkflowContext, id: int, inDF: DataFrame, cust_dict:dict):

    ORDERED_SKUS = ["PRD_CODE_23", "PRD_CODE_21", "PRD_CODE_6", "PRD_CODE_27", "PRD_CODE_15", "PRD_CODE_26"]
    df = inDF.select("*").toPandas()

    #when Laddering is True
    led = optimize_revenue(df, ORDERED_SKUS, laddering=True)
    d111 = pd.DataFrame(led[1:][0]).T
    d1 = d111[['Price', 'Revenue','Pred_Vol']]
    d11 = d1.reset_index()
    d11.columns = ['PRD_CD', 'Price', 'Revenue','Pred_Vol']
    replacement_dict = {
    "PRD_CODE_21": "PRD_CODE_21-128",
    "PRD_CODE_27": "PRD_CODE_27-64",
    "PRD_CODE_23": "PRD_CODE_23-192",
    "PRD_CODE_6": "PRD_CODE_6-84",
    "PRD_CODE_15": "PRD_CODE_15-42",
    "PRD_CODE_26": "PRD_CODE_26-28"  }
    d11["PRD_CD"] = d11["PRD_CD"].replace(replacement_dict)
    d11["PACK_COUNT"] = d11["PRD_CD"].apply(lambda x: x.split('-')[1])
    d11["PACK_COUNT"] = pd.to_numeric(d11["PACK_COUNT"])    
    schema = StructType([StructField("PRD_CD", StringType(), True)
                            , StructField("Price", DoubleType(), True)
                            , StructField("Revenue", DoubleType(), True)
                            , StructField("Pred_Vol", DoubleType(), True)
                            , StructField("PACK_COUNT", IntegerType(), True)
                            ])
    outDF = spark.createDataFrame(d11, schema=schema)

    return outDF

b.Price as MAX_PRD_PRICE, b.Pred_Vol as MAX_PRED_VOLUME, 
    b.REVENUE MAX_REVENUE,
  CASE b.PRD_CD 
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_26-28' THEN 499 
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_27-64' THEN 1399 
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_21-128' THEN 2799  
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_6-84' THEN 1698  
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_15-42' THEN 849  
        WHEN 'PRD_CODE_23-192' THEN 3899  
        ELSE 0  -- Default value when ASIN does not match any case
    END * b.Pred_Vol AS MRP_REVENUE 
FROM fire_temp_table b

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
select a.PRD_CD,a.PACK_COUNT,a.MAX_PRD_PRICE PRICE_WITHOUT,a.MAX_PRED_VOLUME VOLUME_WITHOUT,a.MAX_REVENUE REVENUE_WITHOUT,a.MRP_REVENUE MRP_REVENUE_WITHOUT,
b.MAX_PRD_PRICE,b.MAX_PRED_VOLUME,b.MAX_REVENUE ,b.MRP_REVENUE MRP_REVENUE
from tempTable1 a JOIN tempTable2 b ON a.PRD_CD = b.PRD_CD  
ORDER BY a.PACK_COUNT DESC
